Container.Name: codimd

Overview.Overview: Codimd gives you access to all your files wherever you are.[br][br]CodiMD is a real-time, multi-platform collaborative markdown note editor. This means that you can write notes with other people on your desktop, tablet or even on the phone. You can sign-in via multiple auth providers like Facebook, Twitter, GitHub and many more on the homepage.[br][br]You can add extra environmental parameters for more granular control. Read the docs here:.[br][br]https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-codimd#parameters

Config.Name: Webui
Config.Description: If you wish to access this container from http://{IP}:{PORT} this must be left unchanged. If you intend to access from behind a reverse proxy, this can be changed safely. This is a limitation of the way CodiMD works.

Config.Name: DB_HOST
Config.Description: URL or IP or container name (if using a custom network) of your database, (Leave blank if using sqlite)

Config.Name: DB_PORT
Config.Description: Port number of your database, (Leave blank if using sqlite)

Config.Name: DB_USER
Config.Description: Name of user to connect to the database, (Leave blank if using sqlite)

Config.Name: DB_PASS
Config.Description: Password of the above user, (Leave blank if using sqlite)
